sub_title: Kareem Tours an inbound tours operator
summary: We are Kareem Tours Syria , an Incoming Tour Operator in Damascus.We want to be different and offer exclusive tours, with a new perspective and a strong Arabic and oriental style.We focus on Arabic Oriental hotels and Palaces(Boutique Hotels or Hotels de Charme):-Oriental Nights: whole tour in Arabic hotels: in Damascus,Hama and Aleppo(3*, 4* and 5* category).We offer tours for Individual and Groups in Syria, Jordan, and Lebanon in order to show them the great Civilization, inheritance and History of Damascus and Syria and its role and importance in the past and nowadays. We have a perspective to show them the real Damascus and Syria, not the commercial and tourist one,  We want to have a special and different “touch”, giving a deep and strong track of Arabic-Islamic identity and culture, in the choice of our itineraries and partners (hotels, restaurants, guides ...).We offer a personalized and authentic service: a A'rada (typical folkloric group) upon the arrival at the airport, a Hammam (Turkish bath).We offer tours for Individual and Groups in Syria, Jordan, and Lebanon in order to show them the great Civilization, inheritance and History of Damascus and Syria and its role and importance in the past and nowadays. We have a perspective to show them the real Damascus and Syria, not the commercial and tourist one, change the prejudices and stereotypes in order they go back to their country with a better and correct idea about the Arabs, the Middle East, Muslims and Islam. We offer tailored tours and also guaranteed departure.Specialties: Kareem do Tours in Syria,Lebanon and Jordan for individual and groups.-Avariety of programs for all. -Meet and assistance at the Airport. -Accommodation hotel bookings (Oriental or modern).Transportations: rent car or bus A/C -Tours around Syria, Jordan and Lebanon.-Meals: Half/Full Board or oriental restaurants. -Professional Guide (for most languages).

profile_positions.description: Kareem Tours an inbound tours operator. www.kareemtours.com. Our target audience from the Gulf region, come to visit the Netherlands & Europe. We are interested in working together with travel agencies in all European countries. info@kareemtours.com  Our service for groups and individuals.

company.name: Alafaq Travel & Tourism Service - Alafaq Tours Syria

profile_positions.company: Alafaq Travel & Tourism Service - Alafaq Tours Syria
profile_positions.description:
We are Kareem Tours & Travel an incoming Operator in – Damascus – specialized in Arabic Oriental Palaces & Hotels Tours in Syria. If you do not have a clear idea about your own travel itinerary, let Kareem guide you, know the reality of Syria as well the oldest capital in the world “DAMASCUS”.Kareem welcome you to visit Houses  Oriental Arabic hotels in Damascus & Aleppo. If you like we can provide you pictures. •On facebook (kareem Tours Syria) In addition to Syria we make tours to Lebanon and Jordan. Where we are in coordinating daily with our partners there to offer the best services that our customers deserve. Our Service: •We offer (Arrival at Damascus Int’l Airport, meet and assistance by Kareem representative.) It depends on your request. •Accommodations & Restaurants. We realise visitors to the Middle East are looking for accommodations and dining. We offer to them exactly what they need, we book to our travellers in special charm Oriental Hotels, and sample delicious Arabic Oriental Breakfast or with Lunch & Dinner.•Suitable Guides: AL Afaq believes that the guide is important to the success of the tour. From this point comes our good selection of Guide to deal with him: -Native language.-Friendly. -Who have a deep knowledge of the culture, history, and major sites of interest. •Quality Transportation: AL Afaq Travel & Tours offers Lebanon, and Jordan:Rental cars with or without drivers – New Models:Car, Van, Mini-bus & Bus.-Rental cars, various models, fully insured -Cars with multilingual drivers for FIT round-trips and transfers. -Vans for up to 8 travellers ( pax)  -VIP Vans for up to 4 travellers ( pax) -Mini-buses with 27-30 seats -Tourist coaches with 45-50 seats.
Thank you 
Regards
